title: Is 115 Safe to Upgrade to? Are You Sorry You Did? (as of 8/22/23)
content:
Is 115 safe to upgrade to?

Is there anything about it that made you wish you'd stayed longer with 102?
creator: Toolworker

title: Editing buttons above mail headers
content: Thunderbird 115 doesn't seem to have any means to add/remove/re-order the buttons above the email headers.. Unless I'm not looking in the right place? Anyone have any ideas?
creator: roger.shannon
